phases.title: REGISTRATION & SCREENING
phases.description: Phase 1 focuses on registrations and idea evaluation. Teams submit their ideas and presentations for screening.

phases.title: THE HEIST DAY
phases.description: Phase 2 is the final on-site hackathon where shortlisted teams participate in a full day of coding, mentoring, and presentations.

phases.title: INFILTRATION BEGINS
phases.description: All operators arrive, credentials verified, mission access granted.

phases.title: CODE BREACH PHASE I
phases.description: Initial coding phase where teams begin building their solutions.

phases.title: THE PROFESSOR'S BRIEFING
phases.description: Mentor guidance and review session. Strategic guidance, flaw detection, and optimization.

phases.title: SUPPLY DROP
phases.description: Lunch break. Operatives refuel before final execution phase.

phases.title: CODE BREACH PHASE II
phases.description: Continuous coding and project refinement. Feature completion, debugging, and final system lockdown.

phases.title: EXTRACTION PROTOCOL
phases.description: Final PPT presentation before judges. Teams present their solution and impact.

phases.title: VAULT UNLOCKED
phases.description: Winner announcement and prize distribution. Successful crews escape with rewards.
